meanings.definition: Not belonging to the faculty of a school or university.
meanings.sent1: The nonfaculty staff members help keep the school clean and organized.
meanings.sent2: The nonfaculty employees in the library assist students with finding books.
meanings.sent3: The nonfaculty janitor always has a smile on his face as he works.
meanings.sent4: The nonfaculty gardeners bring life and color to the school grounds.
meanings.sent5: The nonfaculty staff play a crucial role in supporting the academic environment.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a member of the faculty.
meanings.sent1: The school hired several nonfaculty to help with administrative tasks.
meanings.sent2: The nonfaculty were invited to the faculty meeting to share their perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The nonfaculty brought a fresh outlook to the school's decision-making process.
meanings.sent4: The nonfaculty's dedication to their work impressed the faculty members.
meanings.sent5: The nonfaculty's contributions were recognized and appreciated by all.
